description: A thousand kilograms of pure driving joy. The Coastal Roadster is a minimalist masterpiece â€” no turbo, no AWD tricks, no electronic aids. Just a high-revving engine, perfect weight distribution, and a chassis so balanced it reads your mind.
lore: Zenith's engineers had one rule when designing the Coastal Roadster: if it doesn't make the car faster, remove it. The result is a car that weighs nothing, revs to 9,000 RPM, and has 50/50 weight distribution. It's the closest thing to telepathy on four wheels.
